"I'm not sure, maybe it's because you're not following the instructions properly or using the right detergent."
"It could be that your machine is malfunctioning. Have you checked the manual or tried contacting the manufacturer?"
"Perhaps you're not loading the machine correctly. Make sure to distribute the laundry evenly and avoid overloading."
"It's possible that the drum of the machine is not rotating properly. Check the settings and make sure the drum is not set to a slower speed."
"There could be a problem with the water supply or drainage. Check the hoses and make sure there are no kinks or blockages."
